== About Me ==
Hey!
My name is Thibault Ferrante. I am a member of the Kernel Team at Canonical.
Grew up in France before leaving for the Netherlands.

== What I do ==
I joined the Kernel Team at Canonical in May 2023. 
Working on releasing kernels and on the enablement of Ubuntu on specific platforms.
